game.name: Drone Zone
game.genres: Action, Indie, Massively Multiplayer, RPG, Free To Play
game.categories: Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op
game.shortDescription: Multiplayer team-based tactical shooter in a postapocaliptic world. This is not FPV drones. Future. Technology assists in managing flight and targeting. Fight for resources in a world full of hostile anomalies. Use active skills and get advantage depending on which enemy module you have destroyed.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Multiplayer team-based tactical shooter in a postapocaliptic world. This is not FPV drones. Future. Technology assists in managing flight and targeting. Fight for resources in a world full of hostile anomalies. Use active skills and get advantage depending on which enemy module you have destroyed.
